song_lyrics: Haiye harakh na māy re, haiye harakh na māy re,
Mandir utsav āvyo, bhakto than-gan than-gan thāy re...
Mangal gīto gāvo āvo, mangal gīto gāvo,
Mangal gīto gāvo re āvo, mandir utsav āvyo re āvyo,
Shrījīne vadhāvo, Swāmīne vadhāvo,
Monghe monghe motīḍe vadhāvo... Mangal
Pramukh Swāmīnā āpaṇ shīre anant chhe upakār,
Divya upāsanā satsang dīdho,
Dūr deshāvar pār,
Agaṇit janme thaī shake nā,
Ṛuṇ muktino lāhvo... Mangal
Satsangathī parivār ekatā thāy samāj uddhār,
Ho haiye shānti akhanḍ ubhare, mahimā aparampār,
Saunā sevak banī guṇo laī satsangne vikasāvo... Haiye
Mangal chhāī rahyo tribhuvanme,
Sur nar muni harakhe sab manme,
Ānand chhāī rahyo tribhuvanme.
Chhalak chhalak chhal chhalake re, ānand āṭho jām,
Farar farar far farake upāsanā dhvaj farake re,
Mandir gāmo gām,
Pragaṭ Prabhune pāmīne thayā chhe pūraṇkām,
Sau thayā chhe pūraṇkām,
Pramukh Swāmīnā sange amane, maḷyu chhe Akṣhardhām... Chhalak
Samp suhṛudbhāv ekatā rākhī sevāmā gulatān,
Ame sau sevāmā gulatān,
Sādhan ame to lesh na kīdhā, thayā re niṣhṭhāvān.. Chhalak
title: Mandir utsav āvyo (mandir utsav gīt)

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1300: unknown

Category: Nrutya Gito
